entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `args` in top-level program should be colored as a contextual keyword. #59569
  • Find All References to include external references #59568
    17.2
  • Missing important ways to fix ambiguity error in top-level program with implicit-usings #59564
  • The pre-selected "Suggest Name" for parameters has inconistent casing and violates .editorconfig #59562
  • `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` doesn't respect `PreferParameterNullChecking` #59559
  • [Unity] Telegram.Td.dll - Assets\Example.cs(4,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'Telegram' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #59557

Closed

  • Go to Implementation/Base to include external references #58147
    17.2
  • list pattern with conjunctive and pattern #58738
    17.2
  • Report Dictionary value assignment as Write instead of Read #46276
    Backlog
  • VB Quick Action, Generate Equal(Object) crashes #45919
    Next
  • Discrepancy between code metadata and behavior for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.BinaryOperator #59359
    Backlog
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 ("CompilerServer: server failed [...] Reached end of stream before end of read.") #59336
    17.2
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    17.2
  • TestGetAsyncEnumeratorPatternOnRange is flaky #58196
    17.2
  • "Generate GetHashCode()" is using System.HashCode when it's not available #45995
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete directory in semantic-snippets feature branch #59571
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59570
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Move RE0001 - draft #59563
    Area-IDE
  • Respect PreferParameterNullChecking user option #59561
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid loading assemblies that only contain IDE analyzers #59554
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE
  • Do not remove parentheses from arithmetic ops in 'checked' contexts #59552
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitIsPatternExpression - add handling for list-pattern specific patterns #59285
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Make solution options global"" #59567
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add missing project references to Core deployment #59566
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix PythiaOptions #59565
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix Generate-Equals for VB when invoked on type header. #59548
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix warning on conversion of anon func with implicit parameters #59522
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59560
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide f1 help for discards #59543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59558
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Make solution options global" #59537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59556
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59555
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use GetBestTypeByMetadataName in 'use System.HashCode' fixer #59547
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59550
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59551
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Produce better error for members in top-level main #59321
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for streamjsonrpc request handling #59510
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use segmented arrays for VirtualChar storage #59503
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community
